extDescription.message: Click-to-Dial, status updates and queue monitoring

dialTo.description: Text for the title of the Click-to-Dial popup.

clicktodialStatusLabel.description: Label for the call status in the Click-to-Dial popup.

loginFormUsernameLabel.description: Label for the login form of the field 'username'.

loginFormPasswordLabel.description: Label for the login form of the field 'password'.

loginFormLoginFailedText.description: Text to show after a failed login attempt.

loginFormLoginErrorText.description: Text to show after a failed login attempt.

loginFormLogoutText.description: Text to show after logging out successfully.

loginFormLoadingText.description: Text to show while trying to log in.

popoutTitle.description: Text for the separate BLF icon.

availabilityWidgetTitle.description: Text of the title of the availability widget.

availabilityOptionsTitle.description: Text of the title for the availability options.

noAvailabilityOptionsText.message: You have no destinations at the moment.
noAvailabilityOptionsText.description: Text to show in case there are no destinations to choose from.

availabilityUnauthorizedWarning.message: Sorry! You are not authorized to change your availability.
availabilityUnauthorizedWarning.description: Text you see instead of the widget in case you're missing permissions.

contactsWidgetTitle.description: Text of the title of the contacts widget.

noContactsText.description: Text to show in case there are no contacts to display.

noContactsFoundText.description: Text to show in case there are no contacts found.

contactsUnauthorizedWarning.message: Sorry! You are not authorized to monitor your colleagues' presence.
contactsUnauthorizedWarning.description: Text you see instead of the widget in case you're missing permissions.

contactsConnectingTitle.description: Text you the title for the connecting icon for contacts.

contactsNoConnectionTitle.message: No presence information available right now.
contactsNoConnectionTitle.description: Text you the title for the disconnected icon for contacts.

queuesWidgetTitle.description: Text of the title of the queues widget.

noQueuesText.description: Text to show in case there are no queues to display.

queuesUnauthorizedWarning.message: Sorry! You are not authorized to monitor any queues you might have.
queuesUnauthorizedWarning.description: Text you see instead of the widget in case you're missing permissions.

unauthorizedNotificationText.message: In order to use Click-to-Dial, you first need to log in by clicking the toolbar icon and entering your login details.
unauthorizedNotificationText.description: Text for the notification shown when calling the API on the remote server returns status '401 Unauthorized'.

callStatusNotificationText.description: Text for the notification shown when a call could not setup successfully.

clicktodialStatusFailedA.message: We could not reach your phone

clicktodialStatusBlacklisted.message: The number is on the blacklist

clicktodialCallingText.description: Text to show while status is unknown.

contextMenuLabel.description: Text for the option in the right click menu.

optionsSaveText.description: Success message after saving changes in the options.

optionsPageTitle.description: Text for the title of the options page.

optionsItemTitle.description: Text for the link to the options sub page for general options.

optionsItemHeader.description: Text of the header on the options sub page 'options'.

c2dOptionLabel.description: Label for the 'options' form of the field 'c2d'.

platformUrlOptionlabel.message: URL to the resource where information is read from
platformUrlOptionlabel.description: Label for the 'options' form of the field 'platformUrl'.

platformUrlOptionWarninglabel.message: You will be automatically logged out when changing this setting
platformUrlOptionWarninglabel.description: Warning for the 'options' form  of the field 'platformUrl'.

saveButtonText.description: Text for the button to save settings.
